LightningComponentBundle.description: Component to add an image to another LWC or Lightning App, Flow, Home, Tab etc.

property.label: Url
property.name: url
property.description: Required Absolute Url for the image.

property.label: Width
property.name: width
property.description: Optional Width attribute for the image.

property.label: Height
property.name: height
property.description: Optional Height attribute for the image.

property.label: Alt
property.name: alt
property.description: Optional Alt text to display for the image.

property.label: Class
property.name: imgClass
property.description: Optional Class name to apply to the image tag.
